close_door.description: Close the safe door by swinging it to a closed position.

open_door.description: The door is already in an opened status.
Open the safe door by swinging it to an opened position.

close_door.description: The door is already in a closed status.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to unlock the safe.

flip_handle.description: Flip the handle to open the safe.

clean_safe_body.description: Clean the safe body to remove the dust.

safe_operation.description: Open the safe by rotating the knob and flipping the handle, then close the door.

cleaning.description: Clean the entire safe including door, knob, handle and safe body.
